Inclusion criterion permanent atrial fibrillation verify electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , leave ventricular ejection fraction ( EF ) ≥ 45 % significant valvular lesion verify ultrasound . Exclusion criterion : Coronary event angina pectoris within 3 month prior inclusion , stroke residual symptom , presence pacemaker able participate functional test due disability , read Swedish .
